assessment_name: NHS Data Governance GDPR Compliance Assessment

consent_management.details: Assessment of consent records and management practices

data_protection_impact.details: Data Protection Impact Assessment for processing activities

access_controls.details: Assessment of data access patterns and security

privacy_information.details: Privacy notice creation and information management

recommendations: Review consent collection process for: Contact for Clinical Trials, Receive Health Newsletters, Share Data with Other NHS Trusts.
Ensure staff receive regular data protection training
Investigate 22 unauthorized access attempts and implement stricter access controls.
Review 82 access attempts during late hours (10 PM - 5 AM) to ensure they are legitimate.
